column3: ## Admin â€“ Reinstate Journal and Add Article
Setup: Log in as ProfessorWobblethorpe, the admin
Select "Journals" and search for "Transactions of Paradoxical Botany"
From Bulk edit records, choose "Reinstate into DOAJ" and submit

column4: Confirm the background job at /admin/background_jobs shows outcome fail
Confirm message "The status couldn't be changed. For at least one journal other journals with matching ISSN(s) already exists in doaj"

column3: Attempt to reinstate the journal by clicking the "Reinstate" button

column4: The message is displayed "The status couldn't be changed. For at least one journal other journals with matching ISSN(s) already exists in doaj"

column3: Click "Unlock & Close" on the journal page
In the CRUD Articles section, click "Post" and "Try it out"
Paste the article source provided with the test

column4: Journal "Advanced Transactions of Paradoxical Botany" is displayed

column3: Click "Articles" to search for journal's articles

column4: Article "Investigating Photosynthetic Anomalies in Invisible Ferns" is listed
